Is this how gizmos rotation should look like?

![FjnZe0a.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FjnZe0a.jpg)

No it's not, but that's how the proprietary driver renders them, interestingly they are fine when using the open source drivers for either AMD or Nvidia.

I don't know how to fix it, or why the proprietary driver treats them differently.
